name: Zerocode Chatbot App
desc: A simple and elegant chatbot web app built using TypeScript, React, HTML, and CSS. Features include secure authentication, responsive UI, and real-time dummy message stream.

name: Book Management Dashboard
desc: A responsive frontend dashboard for managing books with CRUD operations, filtering, and clean UI components.

name: Tagada
desc: Full-Stack project to help users 'Buy Your Time' through a service-oriented application. Built with modern frontend and backend stacks.

name: Hoobank App
desc: A modern and visually appealing frontend finance landing page using React and Tailwind CSS. Clean layout and smooth scrolling animations.

name: Pinterest Clone
desc: A MERN stack Pinterest clone featuring image uploads, user authentication, and board management. A full-stack project inspired by the real Pinterest experience.

name: WhatsApp Clone
desc: A frontend clone of WhatsApp web interface using React. Offers chat UI and clean layout for personal projects and learning purposes.

name: Bank Management App
desc: A basic UI for a bank management system. Built using HTML, CSS, and JS with a focus on layout and user experience. Great for UI/UX prototyping.

name: Old Websites
desc: Bestwebs & ColorCoder. Two Years old websites memories. Simple with basic features.

name: Resistor Color Codes
desc: Simply provides the color codes of resistors. Calculation information and about resistors.

name: KIA Info Website
desc: Basic KIA webpage displays the info about seltos product range. Specs and Image Gallery.

name: Burger Shop Dummy
desc: Basic burger shop webpage allow users to check menu and price. Dummy Order Form.

name: Indian Temples
desc: It shows temples of different sectors of India. as user clicks it will redirect to wiki of that temple for info.
